CREATE PROCEDURE [CrisNationalGridWest].[Usp_CRIS_PreProcessXcheckingCurrentAccountBill]
AS
BEGIN
	DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #NgridCurrentPeriodBill;

	SELECT B.AccountNumber
        ,B.BillingPeriod
        ,B.UtilityServiceAccountName
        ,B.UtilityServiceAddress
        ,CAST(P.OldCurrentAccountBalance AS MONEY) AS OldCurrentAccountBalance
        ,CAST(ISNULL(P.PaymentAmount,0) AS MONEY) AS PaymentAmount
        ,B.GasChargeAmount
        ,CAST(0.00 AS MONEY) AS RevisedGasChargeAmount
        ,CAST(0.00 AS MONEY) AS CancelGasChargeAmount
        ,B.AccountArrears
        ,B.TerminationBalance
        ,B.MiscellaneousChargeAmount
        ,P.MiscellaneousCreditAmount
        ,B.CurrentAccountBalance
        ,B.ActivityDateTime
        ,B.MiscellaneousChargeType
        ,P.NumberOfPaymentTransactions
	INTO #NgridCurrentPeriodBill        
	FROM (SELECT AccountNumber
			,BillingPeriod
			,UtilityServiceAccountName
			,UtilityServiceAddress
			,GasChargeAmount
			,CurrentAccountBalance
			,AccountArrears
			,TerminationBalance
			,MiscellaneousChargeAmount
			,MiscellaneousChargeType
			,ActivityDateTime
        FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
        WHERE ActivityDateTime IS NOT NULL) AS B
        LEFT JOIN (SELECT BillingPeriod
				,AccountNumber
				,SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentDate = SPACE(8) THEN 0 ELSE PaymentAmount END) AS PaymentAmount
				,NULL AS OldCurrentAccountBalance
				,SUM(ISNULL(MiscellaneousCreditAmount,0)) AS MiscellaneousCreditAmount
				,COUNT(*) AS NumberOfPaymentTransactions
            FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadPaymentDetail
            GROUP BY BillingPeriod, AccountNumber) AS P ON B.AccountNumber = P.AccountNumber
            AND B.BillingPeriod = P.BillingPeriod;

	SELECT  'Total Billed Accounts' AS QueryBilled, COUNT(*) FROM #NgridCurrentPeriodBill;

	UPDATE #NgridCurrentPeriodBill
	SET OldCurrentAccountBalance = archive.CurrentAccountBalance
		,AccountArrears = ISNULL(t.AccountArrears, 0)
        ,TerminationBalance = ISNULL(t.TerminationBalance, 0)
        ,MiscellaneousChargeAmount = ISNULL(t.MiscellaneousChargeAmount, 0)
        ,MiscellaneousCreditAmount = ISNULL(t.MiscellaneousCreditAmount, 0)
        ,ActivityDateTime = archive.ActivityDateTime
        ,NumberOfPaymentTransactions = 1
	FROM #NgridCurrentPeriodBill AS t
        INNER JOIN (SELECT AccountNumber
				,MAX(BillingPeriod) AS maxLastBillingPeriod
				,MAX(ActivityDateTime) AS maxLastActivityDateTime
			FROM CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadAccountBillingDetail
			GROUP BY AccountNumber) AS MaxLastBilled ON t.AccountNumber = MaxLastBilled.AccountNumber
        INNER JOIN CrisNationalGridWest.ARCHIVEUploadAccountBillingDetail AS archive ON MaxLastBilled.AccountNumber = archive.AccountNumber
			AND MaxLastBilled.maxLastBillingPeriod = archive.BillingPeriod
			AND MaxLastBilled.maxLastActivityDateTime = archive.ActivityDateTime
	WHERE t.OldCurrentAccountBalance IS NULL;

	UPDATE #NgridCurrentPeriodBill
	SET OldCurrentAccountBalance = 0
		,PaymentAmount = 0
        ,AccountArrears = 0
        ,TerminationBalance = 0
        ,MiscellaneousChargeAmount = ISNULL(t.MiscellaneousChargeAmount, 0)
        ,MiscellaneousCreditAmount = ISNULL(t.MiscellaneousCreditAmount, 0)
        ,ActivityDateTime = GETDATE()
        ,NumberOfPaymentTransactions = 1
	FROM #NgridCurrentPeriodBill AS t
        INNER JOIN (SELECT CurrentAccountNumber AS AccountNumber15,
				SUBSTRING(CurrentAccountNumber, 1, 11) AS AccountNumber11
			FROM Common.ExchangeData) AS ExchangeAccount ON SUBSTRING(t.AccountNumber, 1, 11) = ExchangeAccount.AccountNumber11
	WHERE t.OldCurrentAccountBalance IS NULL;

	DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #NoCurrentTransaction;

	SELECT NoCurrent.UploadAccountBillingDetailSeqid
        ,NoCurrent.AccountNumber
        ,cg.GasChargeAmount
        INTO #NoCurrentTransaction
	FROM (SELECT UploadAccountBillingDetailSeqid
			,Notes
			,BillingPeriod
			,BillingPeriodRevision
			,AccountNumber
			,ActivityCode
			,ActivityDate
			,ActivityTime
			,ActivityDateTime
			,TransactionCode
			,GasChargeAmount
		FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
        WHERE Notes LIKE 'National Grid did not report a current period transaction%') AS NoCurrent
        INNER JOIN (SELECT UploadAccountBillingDetailSeqid
				,Notes
				,BillingPeriod
				,BillingPeriodRevision
				,AccountNumber
				,ActivityCode
				,ActivityDate
				,ActivityTime
				,ActivityDateTime
				,TransactionCode
				,GasChargeAmount
            FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
            WHERE ActivityDateTime IS NULL AND TransactionCode = 'BI') AS cg ON NoCurrent.AccountNumber = cg.AccountNumber
				AND NoCurrent.ActivityDate = cg.ActivityDate AND NoCurrent.ActivityTime = cg.ActivityTime;

	UPDATE #NgridCurrentPeriodBill
	SET GasChargeAmount = n.GasChargeAmount
	FROM #NoCurrentTransaction AS n
		INNER JOIN #NgridCurrentPeriodBill AS c ON n.AccountNumber = c.AccountNumber;

	UPDATE #NgridCurrentPeriodBill
	SET CancelGasChargeAmount = CancelGasCharge.CancelGasChargeAmount
	FROM (SELECT  AccountNumber
			,SUM(GasChargeAmount) AS CancelGasChargeAmount
		FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
		WHERE ActivityDateTime IS NULL AND TransactionCode = 'BC'
		GROUP BY AccountNumber) AS CancelGasCharge
        INNER JOIN #NgridCurrentPeriodBill AS c ON CancelGasCharge.AccountNumber = c.AccountNumber;

	UPDATE #NgridCurrentPeriodBill
	SET GasChargeAmount = OBDGasCharge.GasChargeAmount
	FROM (SELECT summed.AccountNumber
            ,summed.GasChargeAmount
            ,summed.OBDBillTypeCount
		FROM (SELECT UploadAccountBillingDetailSeqid
				,BillingPeriod
				,BillingPeriodRevision
				,AccountNumber
				,ActivityCode
				,ActivityDate
				,ActivityTime
				,ActivityDateTime
				,TransactionCode
				,GasChargeAmount
            FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
			WHERE AccountNumber ='070580990010000') AS obd -- OBD Account
            INNER JOIN (SELECT AccountNumber
					,SUM(GasChargeAmount) AS GasChargeAmount
					,COUNT(*) AS OBDBillTypeCount
				FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
				WHERE TransactionCode = 'BI' AND ActivityDateTime IS NULL
                GROUP BY AccountNumber) AS summed ON obd.AccountNumber = summed.AccountNumber) AS OBDGasCharge
        INNER JOIN #NgridCurrentPeriodBill AS c ON OBDGasCharge.AccountNumber = c.AccountNumber;

	UPDATE #NgridCurrentPeriodBill
	SET RevisedGasChargeAmount = RevisedGasCharge.RevisedBilledAmount
	FROM (SELECT AccountNumber
            ,SUM(CASE WHEN TransactionCode = 'BI' THEN GasChargeAmount ELSE 0 END) AS RevisedBilledAmount
            ,SUM(CASE WHEN TransactionCode = 'BC' THEN GasChargeAmount ELSE 0 END) AS CanceledBilledAmount
            ,SUM(CASE WHEN ActivityDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN CurrentAccountBalance ELSE 0 END) AS CurrentAccountBalance
            ,COUNT(*) AS AllTransactionCount
		FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
		GROUP BY AccountNumber) AS RevisedGasCharge
        INNER JOIN #NgridCurrentPeriodBill AS c ON RevisedGasCharge.AccountNumber = c.AccountNumber;

	SELECT 'Total Billed Accounts with NULL OldCurrentAccountBalance' AS QueryBilled
		,COUNT(*) FROM #NgridCurrentPeriodBill
	WHERE OldCurrentAccountBalance IS NULL;

	SELECT AccountNumber
		,BillingPeriod
		,UtilityServiceAccountName
		,UtilityServiceAddress
		,OldCurrentAccountBalance
		,PaymentAmount
		,GasChargeAmount
		,GasChargeAmount - RevisedGasChargeAmount AS CalcGasChargeAmount
		,RevisedGasChargeAmount
		,CancelGasChargeAmount
		,AccountArrears
		,TerminationBalance
		,MiscellaneousChargeAmount
		,MiscellaneousCreditAmount
		,OldCurrentAccountBalance - PaymentAmount + GasChargeAmount
			+ CancelGasChargeAmount  + MiscellaneousChargeAmount
			- MiscellaneousCreditAmount AS CalcCurrentAccountBalance
		,CurrentAccountBalance
		,CurrentAccountBalance - (GasChargeAmount + MiscellaneousChargeAmount
			- MiscellaneousCreditAmount) AS NetPaidAdjustment
	FROM #NgridCurrentPeriodBill;
END;
